entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR, HOT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
